plot: Jose, a construction day laborer, works hard each day in America and sends his money home to his wife and child. His spirits are lifted when he befriends a lost donkey and the younger men ...
title: Hey José!
plot_es: Jose, a construction day laborer, works hard each day in America and sends his money home to his wife and child. His spirits are lifted when he befriends a lost donkey and the younger men ...
